name: Bl0ck [Glitched]
description:
Play the classic Atari game BL0CK, but something is corrupting the code... 

Can you hear it sing?

Quiet the whispers; close the loop...

[]

Gregory Blomquist - Game Designer, Writer, Level Designer

Cory Rupert - Game Designer, Lead Programmer, Artist, Audio

Julia Rupert - Voice Acting
